Reviews.Title: “Great breakfast, staff & location- paper thin walls & uncomfortable beds”
Reviews.Author: 18McClarke
Reviews.Content: We arrived to a attentive night porter who told us what's what, he made the effort to look for a key card with a union jack on one & a red bus on another & this we thought was sweet, even though he took a few mins doing it & we were ready for bed at this point. Se we had got a weekend special deal, 4 nights with breakfast, I full empty of mini bar & 1730 late check out all for £310. Quite a good deal. So we got a high-ish level as we requested this in our booking (we both like a good view & high floors are generally quiter right?) not here, the noise is a bit of a prob mainly because of inconsiderate guests who don't realise how thin the walls are!! Also quite a lot of street noise once woken! They provide you with 1 pillow each so I asked for more which wasn't a prob. So breakfast.....lovely lady looking after the buffet of traditional Catalan spread of yummy cured meats, breads, amazing choc drink, juicy fresh cut fruit, great tea selection, fresh perfect scrambled eggs, Spanish donuts & perfect mini pastry selection. I run a resturant & I really enjoyed this part of our stay. The Fully stocked mini bar contained 2 beers, 2 waters, 2 cokes & 2 more pop cans + 1 bag of crisps so if you are hoping for a knees- up room party then it's not that type of mini bar as it could have been perseved on line. The bathroom & shower were fine & all other room facilities were good. Reception team helpfully if you need them. Free 30 wifi daily for guests in reception area. Kind reception man also helped with local tapas sujestion & printed our birding pass out for us. All in all a good place to stay but take note of my points before you book C&G

Reviews.Title: “nice biz hotel”
Reviews.Author: Toyaz
Reviews.Content: i stayed here during the mobile world congress, the hotel is in a goofd locatiom, close to the metro, rooms are decent and clean, staff at the reception is firendly and collaborative, breakfast is OK and price affordable. good if you're on a business trip

Reviews.Title: “Average”
Reviews.Author: KR_EDINBURGH
Reviews.Content: Stayed just one night and paid 120 euros for standard room. It was showing signs of needing renovation, walls were scuffed and bathroom a bit dirty. Not what I would expect from a supposedly quality hotel. Bed was comfy and room fairly spacious, if completely devoid of character. Breakfast for 10 euro of buffet was probably best aspect of hotel. Location is also decent, but having stayed at another hotel close to here before (aparthotel sliver) it was better.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable Stay”
Reviews.Author: Andgreen
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel for 3 nights in September and found it to be a great little hotel in a nice residential location. Not in the centre but great location for the metro ( Fontana being the nearest stop). The staff were friendly but not overtly so, the rooms clean but not huge and the breakfast was great if you are happy with pastries, breads and cereals (which I am).Overall a great base for touring around the fab city of Barcelona.

Reviews.Title: “One week with Family in Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: sishab
Reviews.Content: Our family of three stayed at NH Belagua for one week in September 2011. Here is how I find this hotel: Positive: 1. Close to city center (5 minutes walk to subway stations, from there 2 stops to the heart of town) 2. Good neighborhood - seemed safe, close to shops/cafes 3. Clean (towels and bed sheets were very clean; excellent daily cleaning service!) 4. Price was reasonable for 92 euros tax included per night for one room Negative: 1. Mattress - our mattress was not particularly comfortable, it felt like there is a cut width wise in the middle of the mattress 2. Paying extra 10.5 euros per day for Internet in the room and extra 16 euros per person for breakfast Note: 1. Breakfast is simple, not a large variety, yet enjoyable - 16 euros a day a bit too much, but you can book it in advance and get it for 8-10 euros per person 2. With north-American standards, rooms are small, for us the size was acceptable 3. Walls are thin, you will definitely hear your neighbors;) we didn't mind that 4. Staff are good - not too warm and welcoming but they do their job well 5. Although you have to pay an extra 10.5 for 24 hours of Internet in your room, the hotel offers a free half an hour Internet connection in the lobby We had a certain budget for our trip; with the same budget, I would again stay at this hotel. If my budget improves I might find a better hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Average hotel, good location”
Reviews.Author: RobertVPrague
Reviews.Content: We spent 7 nights in this hotel in August 2011. Advantage: location - close to the center, by train 2 stops to Placa Catalunya (about 6 minutes), lot of restaurants, for breakfest try Bocí or Bopan price - about 60 eur/night furniture - quite new cleanliness Disadvantage quality of the wall - very thin, you can hear almost everything door - very noisy when closing, especially when the staff was cleaning the room from 7a.m. and you want to sleep wifi - for 10 eur/day, for free only 30 minutes a day in lobby extension - 10 eur for one hour noise from outside safe deposit - was closed and very smelly Overall the quality of sleeping was very bad (noise from other rooms, from outside and bcs of the doors) staff - not very friendly Next time in Barcelona - not this hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good location and reasonable rates”
Reviews.Author: Eduardo S
Reviews.Content: The most sightseeing are walking distance from this hotel. Very safe area, even to go out at night. I did really like the staff. They aren't friendly at all. If you walk couple blocks, you will find great restaurants and shops. The worst thing about this hotel is the internet. They only allow once a day, 30min free access at the lobby. Overall is a great place.

Reviews.Title: “Do not stay in August”
Reviews.Author: infast
Reviews.Content: Do not stay in August as the hotel goes into hibernation. The hotel was decent enough and well placed for the metro. They should have said that in August the majority of staff go away and therefore the bar is closed and the restaurant is closed apart from a very poor cold selection at breakfast. Recommend the T10 metro ticket as you tend to go through them in no time. The 4 of us went through 5 over 3 days.

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel close to Park Guell”
Reviews.Author: Kasiuleczek
Reviews.Content: We stayed in NH Belagua for a week. The hotel itself is small and a little noisy. We liked the room and localisation of the hotel. Close to Fontana and Gracia metro stations. The street was noisy and we didn't open the window too much. But AC was really good while closed windows kept the noise outside. The only true disadvantage was breakfast - small choice, every day exactly the same things, we had to wait for bread or hot water as two waiters didn't manage to keep the plates full. Still, we very much enjoyed our stay. :-)

Reviews.Title: “Noisiest hotel ever”
Reviews.Author: bidibule13
Reviews.Content: I travel often to Barcelona and the office booked me this hotel to me close to the meeting room. Arrived at the hotel around 2pm, check out was easy. Got a room on the 3RD floor, Rooms are noisy as they have no double glazing and the hotel is downtown. Then the cleaners are making horrendous noise, i can't even talk by phone. Ask the reception to do something and they say, they can't !!! It's quite expensive and definetely do not recommend this place for persons who want to sleep in the morning or work from their room. Awful noise, awful staff, and not even a nice location.

Reviews.Title: “Consistently good and satisfactory”
Reviews.Author: MemberfromPadova
Reviews.Content: NH Belagua is a business oriented hotel located 500 m off the Avenida Diagonal and 200 m away - 10 min walk - from the closest subway stop (Fontana). The hotel is in a residential part of the district of Gracia, thus not very central. On the other side, the location is relatively quiet. Rooms are no frills, but perfectly adequate, very clean and comfortable. Staff is corteous and helpful. I have use this hotel a few times and I have always been very satisfied despite being a bit off track from where "life" is. But as long as you travel for business, I think this is a good choice, also in view of a very good value for money.
